name: Anemoia
description:
Welcome to ANEMOIA, a short game about liminal spaces. In this game, you explore 5 liminal spaces. (Sorry I couldn't add more!) This game was made for the Brackeys Game Jam 2022.1.

Credits:

  • Plazmin
  • staffantan - VHS Overlay
  • The Brackeys Server (Thanks for helping me create this)

Special Thanks:

  • Xine101
  • DapsterFX
  • ZeWaffelMan
  • Chimplement

If you are playing this for a youtube video or twitch stream, don't forget to credit me!
